info.title: Rental of Vehicles
info.description: This API was created with the aim of managing a dealership's rental registration, storing data and relationships, such as vehicles and their branches and users and their rentals.

get.summary: Return a list of all additional items for vehicles.

200.description: An object containing a JSON array of additional item information for vehicles

post.summary: Register a new additional item for vehicles

201.description: An object that represents an additional item for vehicles

get.summary: Return an object containing additional item information

200.description: An object that represents an additional item for vehicles

put.summary: Update an additional item and return an object with the new values

200.description: An object informing the new additional item information
Returns nothing if successful

get.summary: Return a list of all additional items for vehicles in a branch.

200.description: An object containing a JSON array of additional item information for vehicles in a branch

get.summary: Return a list of all addresses.

200.description: An object containing a JSON array of addresses information

201.description: An object that represents an Address

get.summary: Return an object containing address information

200.description: An object that represents an address

put.summary: Update an address and return an object with the new values

200.description: An object informing the new address information
Returns nothing if successful

get.summary: Return a list of all branches

200.description: An object containing a JSON array of branches information
